name: Josh Simmons (@josh@josh.tel)
summary:
Switching back to Firefox as my daily driver has not been without incident.

I still can't rely on it for video calls (audio goes weird, apparently a regression was introduced recently), and it's crashy in a lossy way. I haven't had to put this much effort into restoring my tabs in years ðŸ˜…

The sharp edges are worth it given the tradeoffs (weighing up privacy and the value of browser engine diversity), but my goodness I hope this gets better.
